HELP_DESC: Sends links to pages where you can purchase subscription
TITLE: Platforms where you can purchase subscription
FOOTER: Read the information about premium perks on the platforms pages
LIST: list of servers where you have enabled premium perks
NO_GUILDS: you don't have servers with enabled perks

ERROR.NO_PREMIUM: you do not have a premium subscription, you can find links to purchase a subscription in `%prefix%boost`
ERROR.ANOTHER_ACTIVATE: premium perks is already activated for this server by another user
ERROR.LIMIT: you can't attach more than %limit% guilds to your subscription
ERROR.UNKNOWN: failed to operate premium for this guild

TOGGLE.DISABLE: you have successfully disabled premium perks for this guild
TOGGLE.ENABLE: you have successfully enabled premium perks for this guild
